text: Hi! How are you feeling today?
Honestly, I just feel a bit off, but don't know why.
It's okay to feel that way sometimes. Want to share what's been on your mind?
It's just college life, you know? On one hand, I'm grateful to be here, but on the other, it's just a lot sometimes.
Balancing everything can definitely be overwhelming. What parts of college life are weighing on you the most right now?
I guess it's the social part. I see my friends hanging out without me sometimes, and it just makes me feel... left out.
Feeling left out is tough. Have you talked to your friends about how this makes you feel?
Not really, I don't want to act like a needy person. Other than that, I’ve also been struggling with my classes a bit more than usual.
It’s important to express your feelings, even if it feels uncomfortable. As for your classes, could it help to set up a study schedule or seek some tutoring?
Maybe, I haven’t really thought about tutoring. I just usually get through on my own.
It might be worth trying. Sometimes, a little guidance can make a big difference. How are you managing your downtime?
Downtime? What’s that? But seriously, I spend most of it just scrolling through stuff online or worrying about what I should be doing.
It sounds like you might not be giving yourself a real break. Maybe intentionally setting time aside to relax could help? Something like reading, or maybe getting outside for a bit?
I used to read a lot before college. Maybe I could get back into that. Thanks for the suggestion.
Returning to something you love could definitely help! It's all about taking small steps. If you ever feel overwhelmed, I’m here to talk.
I appreciate it. It's been nice to have a chat with someone.
Anytime! Remember, taking care of your mental health is just as important as your physical health. I'm here whenever you need.
